author: silviodonato
body:
#### PR description:

See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49344
this PR would fix all Single* generators to actually have only 1 single generator.
This is a big change, so please review this carefully (I'm not expert in generator at all!)

#### PR validation:

```
cmsDriver.py SingleMuPt10_Eta2p85_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase1_2025_realistic --beamspot DBrealistic --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry DB:Extended --era Run3_2025 --relval 9000,100 --fileout file:step1.root  > step1_SingleMuPt10+2025.log  2>&1
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

I don't know, it is up to @cms-sw/generators-l2 to decide it
title: Make Single gun generator to have actually only one single particle (AddAntiParticle = False)
